name: Lost in storm
description:
Lost in storm is a game developed  with the restrictions of the Nokia 3310. 

You're a sailor, the situation is critical because your boat goes through a storm. 

The captain decides to evacuate, but a baby is lost somewhere in the boat. You have to find him before leaving the boat. Your captain and the baby's mother count on you.

Take care of you, the storm has damaged the boat.

Keys : Use directional keys to move the captain (UP, LEFT, RIGHT) and Enter in game menu.
